title: Purchased: His Perfect Wife
description: Lara's beloved restaurant is in crisis.There's only one man who can help—Wolfe Alexander, her tall, dark, brooding stepbrother. Wolfe lives up to his he demands that, in exchange for his money, Lara must become his convenient wife!With no choice but to accept Wolfe's terms, Lara is soon swept into his world of high-society glamour beyond her wildest dreams—and into the passion of his bed. But there is just one thing missing—her husband's love….
author: Helen Bianchin
